channel.title: ODE on Nadhir Hassen
channel.description: Recent content in ODE on Nadhir Hassen

item.title: Neural ODEs
item.description: Instead of specifying a discrete sequence of hidden layers, we parameterize the derivative of the hidden state using a neural network. The output of the network is computed using a black- box differential equation solver.

item.title: Stochastic differential equations: Application to epidemiology
item.description: A SIR model is an epidemiological model that calculates the theoretical number of people infected with a contagious disease in a closed population over time.
